Portlet Decorators

Legacy Theme provide several portlet decorators to make easy portlet customizations.

Barebone

Portlets will show without portlet title.

Without Padding

Portlet will show without portlet title and padding of portlet content is setted to 0px.

Full Width

Portlet will show without portlet title, padding of portlet content is setted to 0px and portlet fill the window from left to right.
